about_the_game:
Rifted Worlds is a fast-paced Action-RPG where YOU fill in the overworld! Discover the fragments of your lost world, place them onto the map, and explore as you attempt to restore your shattered, deserted world back to its former glory!

It won't be so simple, though... In this mysterious, cosmic graveyard, monstrous beings feed on the remnants of dead worlds, and would-be survivors like yourself are brimming with the mana they so dearly crave...!

If you hope to restore your world, you'll need to fight! Power yourself up with remnant artifacts, learn to use the environment against your foes, and most importantly... You must master the ways of the mysterious Reborn Blade!

  • Discover and place data onto the map via the mysterious Atlas Core, and explore the remnants of destroyed worlds!
  • The map itself will serve as a skill tree! Choose which direction you go in with care...
  • 2.5D Platforming! Jump and dash your way through the remnants, and reach just about anywhere with skillful parkour!
  • Collect spells, augments, and different ways to transform the Reborn Blade! When it comes to the world-eating monsters you're up against, You'll want every advantage you can get...!
  • Randomized loot! You'll never know exactly what you're going to find, or how it might shape either the world, or your character build...
